DOC.brief_title: Meta-analysis Orlistat Laboratory Data From Placebo-controlled Clinical Trials
DOC.criteria: 1 . The trial must randomize placebocontrolled 2 . The orlistat dose must 60mg 120mg 3 . Data ALT BIL must available 4 . The nominal treatment period must 16 week longer 1 . If crossover trial find , data first period exclude .
